name: Dark Breaker: Angel arisen
description:
The Black Angels is crying and the white demon is smirking. Eliminate the origin of evil before the evil of hell ruins the whole world.

Step on to the jorney of concuqer right away. Revisit the classic!

Game Features

[The return of 3 classic classes: Swordsman, Mage and Archer]

Swordsman: Melee Master, balance in attack and defense!
Mage: Element Master, distant poke!
Archer: Fairy Archer, sharpshooter expertise!

[Faction Contest, fight for the greatest glory]

Challenge powerful BOSS, claim upgraded Artifact!
Ignite the wild battle passion, the duel is on the verge!

[Cross-server Contest, roam in the dark world]

Fight in Dungeons with fellows, challenge strong monsters and shred the limit!
Cross-server group battle with brothers, creating utmost glory!

[Explore Dungeons, unlock hidden galleries]

Hundreds of cool galleries is waiting for you!
Boost attributes with the Cipher Event!

[Exclusive system, beyond your expectation]

Character Growth: Character Transfer, Advancing Artifact, achieve the highest power!
AFK Reward: Easy to use, Auto Level Up, raise power with ease!
Free Transaction: Ultimate Gears, One-key Trade, exchange items with massive EXP!
Timed Event: Attack the Dragon City, Guild War, fight for rare items!


Tips
※ This game contains mild blood and violence.
※ Please mind your gaming time and avoid addiction.
